Action.author: jtclark
Action.body: The Dockerfile patch (https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/20349/) is currently IN-REVIEW. Once this patch has been merged, this will unblock the remaining sub-tasks.

Action.author: jtclark
Action.body: Currently, this is not actively being worked on. Returning this Jira task to the *Backlog*.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: ~suryalnvs , ~dongming what do you guys think about this? Do we still have a need to update (and document) pte docker images, even on an occasional/manual basis?
